records.title: Svenska Amerikanska Posten, full page advertisement, Minneapolis, Minnesota

sourceResource.title: Svenska Amerikanska Posten, full page advertisement, Minneapolis, Minnesota
sourceResource.description: The 1903 convention of the American Union of Swedish Singers was commemorated with a color page in Svenska Amerikanska Posten.
sourceResource.rights: This image may not be reproduced for any reason without written permission from the American Swedish Institute

collection.title: American Swedish Institute (Digital collection)
collection.description: The American Swedish Institute, a historic museum dedicated to the celebration of Swedish culture, is home to collections on the history of Swedish immigration to the United States, particularly immigration to Minnesota, Swedish-American life and culture and the history and culture of Sweden as it has influenced Swedish America. The American Swedish Institute contributed to Minnesota Reflections images from, Svenska Amerikanska Posten, a Swedish-American newspaper, taken between 1898 and 1903.

records.dataProvider: American Swedish Institute, 2600 Park Avenue South, Minneapolis, MN 55407; http://ASImn.org

records.title: Svenska Amerikanska Posten offices, Minneapolis, Minnesota

sourceResource.title: Svenska Amerikanska Posten offices, Minneapolis, Minnesota

records.title: Minnesota State Fair Dairy Building, St. Paul, Minnesota

sourceResource.title: Minnesota State Fair Dairy Building, St. Paul, Minnesota
sourceResource.description: Color postcard of the Minnesota State Fair's Dairy Building with flags flying. The message on the reverse is in Swedish and is postmarked "Jan 21 1911."
